TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type GroupCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 在單一比對中傳回擷取之群組的集合。

span.span: Returns the set of captured groups in a single match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是以零為起始的集合類別，其中包含一或多個提供相關資訊的物件擷取規則運算式相符項目中的群組。The class is a zero-based collection class that consists of one or more objects that provide information about captured groups in a regular expression match. 集合是不可變 （唯讀） 並沒有公用建構函式。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. A物件由屬性。A object is returned by the property. 集合包含一或多個物件。The collection contains one or more objects. 如果比對成功，集合中的第一個項目包含物件，對應至整個相符項目。If the match is successful, the first element in the collection contains the object that corresponds to the entire match. 每個後續項目代表擷取的群組，如果規則運算式包含擷取群組。Each subsequent element represents a captured group, if the regular expression includes capturing groups. 中 （未命名） 的編號擷取群組相符項目會出現在相符項目之前的數字順序中，從具名擷取群組。Matches from numbered (unnamed) capturing groups appear in numeric order before matches from named capturing groups. 如果比對不成功，則集合會包含單一物件，其屬性是`false`，且屬性等於。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains a single object whose property is `false` and whose property equals . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 群組建構和規則運算式物件 」 一節[的群組建構](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)文章。For more information, see the "Grouping Constructs and Regular Expression Objects" section in the [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md) article. 若要逐一查看集合的成員，您應該使用您的語言所提供的反覆項目集合建構 (例如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中) 而不是擷取列舉值所傳回方法。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. 此外，您可以存取個別編號的擷取的群組，從屬性 (C# 索引子），而且您可以存取個別具名的擷取的群組，從屬性。In addition, you can access individual numbered captured groups from the property (the indexer in C#), and you can access individual named captured groups from the property. 請注意，您可以擷取陣列，其中包含的數字和所有的擷取群組的名稱，藉由呼叫和方法，分別。Note that you can retrieve an array that contains the numbers and names of all capturing groups by calling the and methods, respectively. 兩者都是執行個體方法，而且需要您具現化物件，表示要比對的規則運算式。Both are instance methods and require that you instantiate a object that represents the regular expression to be matched. ## Examples 下列範例會使用規則運算式擷取群組來擷取資訊的商標和文字中所使用的註冊的商標。The following example uses a regular expression with capturing groups to extract information about trademarks and registered trademarks used in text. 規則運算式模式是`\b(\w+?)([\u00AE\u2122])`，這樣就會解譯為下表所示。The regular expression pattern is `\b(\w+?)([\u00AE\u2122])`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|尋找字組界限。Look for a word boundary.| |`(\w+?)`|一或多個文字字元的外觀。Look for one or more word characters. 在一起，這些形成商標的名稱。Together, these form the trademarked name. （請注意，這個規則運算式會假設商標組成單一文字）。這是第一個擷取群組。(Note that this regular expression assumes that a trademark consists of a single word.) This is the first capturing group.| |`([\u00AE\u2122])`|尋找® 或™ 字元。Look for either the ® or the ™ character. 這是第二個擷取群組。This is the second capturing group.| 每個相符項目，如包含三種物件。For each match, the contains three objects. 第一個物件包含符合整個規則運算式的字串。The first object contains the string that matches the entire regular expression. 第二個物件，表示第一個擷取的群組，其中包含產品名稱。The second object, which represents the first captured group, contains the product name. 第三個物件，代表第二個擷取的群組，包含商標或註冊商標符號。The third object, which represents the second captured group, contains the trademark or registered trademark symbol. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection/cs/Example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection/vb/Example1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int arrayIndex);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 arrayIndex) cil managed
public: virtual void CopyTo(Array ^ array, int arrayIndex);
abstract member CopyTo : Array * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : Array * int -> unit

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.name: arrayIndex
param.span: 在目的陣列中要開始複製的位置。

span.span: The position in the destination array where the copying is to begin.

summary.span: 複製集合的所有項目至指定索引處開始的指定陣列。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array beginning at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為整個集合複製到指定索引處開始的陣列，目的陣列必須至少與集合一樣大。Because the entire collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the collection. > [!WARNING] > 此成員不存在於[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果您正在開發的應用程式為目標[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用方法改為。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取一個句子中的每個單字，並擷取在擷取的群組中，方法則用來複製項目中每個相符項目的物件陣列，其中包含擷取群組的所有相符項目。The following example extracts each word from a sentence and captures it in a capturing group, The method is then used to copy the elements in each match's object to an array that contains the capturing groups from all matches. 個別擷取的文字隨即顯示到主控台。The individual captured words are then displayed to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.copyto/cs/copyto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.copyto/vb/copyto1.vb#1)] 規則運算式定義，如下所示：The regular expression is defined as follows: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|比對字邊界。Match a word boundary.| |`(\S+?)`|比對一或多個非空白字元的字元。Match one or more non-white space characters. 請將它們指派給第一個擷取群組。Assign them to the first capturing group.| |`\b`|比對字邊界。Match a word boundary.|

span.span: is .
is outside the bounds of .

span.span: Returns the number of groups in the collection.
The number of groups in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件一律有至少一個成員。The object always has at least one member. 如果比對不成功，屬性會傳回物件，其中包含單一成員。If a match is unsuccessful, the property returns a object that contains a single member.

span.span: An enumerator that contains all objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是呼叫方法來擷取列舉值，可讓您逐一物件在集合中，您應該使用群組的反覆項目建構 (例如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中)，是由您的程式語言提供。in Visual Basic) that is provided by your programming language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 此成員不存在於[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果您正在開發的應用程式為目標[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用屬性改為。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the property instead.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(groupnum As Integer) As Group
public: property System::Text::RegularExpressions::Group ^ default[int] { System::Text::RegularExpressions::Group ^ get(int groupnum); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: groupnum
param.span: 要擷取之集合成員的以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the collection member to be retrieved.

summary.span: 以整數索引啟用對集合成員的存取。

span.span: Enables access to a member of the collection by integer index.
The member of the collection specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值的索引 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的預設屬性的類別。The property is the index (in C#) or the default property (in Visual Basic) of the class. 它可讓您使用列舉集合的成員`foreach`C# 中的陳述式或`For Each`Visual Basic 中的陳述式。It allows you to enumerate the members of the collection by using a `foreach` statement in C# or a `For Each` statement in Visual Basic. 您也可以使用這個屬性來擷取個別的擷取的群組，這些項目的索引編號。You can also use this property to retrieve individual captured groups by their index number. 您可以擷取陣列，其中包含所有的擷取群組，規則運算式中的數字，藉由呼叫執行個體方法。You can retrieve an array that contains the numbers of all capturing groups in a regular expression by calling the instance method. 您也可以對應至其數字具名擷取群組，藉由呼叫執行個體方法。You can also map named capturing groups to their numbers by calling the instance method. 您可以擷取的值來判斷集合中的項目數屬性。You can determine the number of items in the collection by retrieving the value of the property. 有效值`groupnum`參數範圍從 0 到小於集合中的項目數。Valid values for the `groupnum` parameter range from 0 to one less than the number of items in the collection. 所傳回的物件屬性一律會有至少一個成員。The object returned by the property always has at least one member. 如果規則運算式引擎在特定的輸入字串，單一找不到任何相符項目集合中的物件都有其屬性設定為`false`及其`Group.Value`屬性設定為。If the regular expression engine cannot find any matches in a particular input string, the single object in the collection has its property set to `false` and its `Group.Value` property set to . 如果`groupnum`不是索引的集合的成員，或者如果`groupnum`是已經有不符合在輸入字串中，此方法會傳回之擷取群組的索引物件，其屬性是`false`，且`Group.Value`屬性是。If `groupnum` is not the index of a member of the collection, or if `groupnum` is the index of a capturing group that has not been matched in the input string, the method returns a object whose property is `false` and whose `Group.Value` property is . ## Examples 下列範例會定義兩個編號的群組所組成的規則運算式。The following example defines a regular expression that consists of two numbered groups. 第一個群組會擷取一或多個連續的數字。The first group captures one or more consecutive digits. 第二個群組會比對單一字元。The second group matches a single character. 規則運算式引擎會尋找第一個群組出現零或一次，因為它不一定會找到相符項目即使規則運算式比對成功。Because the regular expression engine looks for zero or one occurrence of the first group, it does not always find a match even if the regular expression match is successful. 然後範例所示的結果時屬性用來擷取不相符的群組、 一個相符的群組，以及未定義規則運算式中的群組。The example then illustrates the result when the property is used to retrieve an unmatched group, a matched group, and a group that is not defined in the regular expression. 此範例會定義規則運算式模式`(\d+)*(\w)\2`，這樣就會解譯為下表所示。The example defines a regular expression pattern `(\d+)*(\w)\2`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\d+)*`|比對一或多個出現的十進位數字。Match one or more occurrence of a decimal digit. 這是第一個擷取群組。This is the first capturing group. 此模式比對零或一次。Match this pattern either zero or one time.| |`(\w)`|這是第二個擷取群組。This is the second capturing group.| |`\k`|比對第二個擷取群組所擷取的字串。Match the string captured by the second capturing group.| [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/cs/item3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/vb/item3.vb#2)]

span.span: Grouping Constructs

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(groupname As String) As Group
public: property System::Text::RegularExpressions::Group ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Text::RegularExpressions::Group ^ get(System::String ^ groupname); };

span.span: The name of a capturing group.

summary.span: 以字串索引啟用對集合成員的存取。

span.span: Enables access to a member of the collection by string index.
The member of the collection specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `groupName` 可以是所定義之擷取群組的名稱`(?<`*名稱*`>)`規則運算式或群組所定義之擷取群組的數字的字串表示中的項目建構。`groupName` can be either the name of a capturing group that is defined by the `(?<`*name*`>)` element in a regular expression, or the string representation of the number of a capturing group that is defined by a grouping construct. 如需有關規則運算式中的群組的詳細資訊，請參閱[的群組建構](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information about groups in regular expressions, see [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md). 您可以擷取所有擷取的群組中的名稱藉由呼叫物件方法。You can retrieve the names of all the captured groups in a object by calling the method. 您也可以將對應的數字的擷取規則的運算式，其名稱中的群組，藉由呼叫方法。You can also map the numbers of capturing groups in a regular expression to their names by calling the method. 從陣列的個別名稱接著傳遞給屬性來擷取擷取的字串。Individual names from the array can then be passed to the property to retrieve the captured string. 如果`groupname`不是集合中之擷取群組的名稱或是否`groupname`是已經有不符合在輸入字串中，此方法會傳回之擷取群組的名稱物件，其屬性是`false`而其`Group.Value`屬性是。If `groupname` is not the name of a capturing group in the collection, or if `groupname` is the name of a capturing group that has not been matched in the input string, the method returns a object whose property is `false` and whose `Group.Value` property is . ## Examples 下列範例會定義兩個具名群組所組成的規則運算式。The following example defines a regular expression that consists of two named groups. 第一個群組中， `numbers`，會擷取一或多個連續的數字。The first group, `numbers`, captures one or more consecutive digits. 第二個群組中， `letter`，符合單一字元。The second group, `letter`, matches a single character. 因為規則運算式引擎會尋找所定義的模式出現零或一次`numbers`群組中，`numbers`群組並非永遠顯示即使比對成功。Because the regular expression engine looks for zero or one occurrence of the pattern defined by the `numbers` group, the `numbers` group is not always present even if a match is successful. 然後範例所示的結果時屬性用來擷取不相符的群組、 一個相符的群組，以及未定義規則運算式中的群組。The example then illustrates the result when the property is used to retrieve an unmatched group, a matched group, and a group that is not defined in the regular expression. 此範例會定義規則運算式模式`(?\d+)*(?\w)\k`，這樣就會解譯為下表所示。The example defines a regular expression pattern `(?\d+)*(?\w)\k`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(?\d+)*`|比對一或多個出現的十進位數字。Match one or more occurrence of a decimal digit. 命名此`numbers`擷取群組。Name this the `numbers` capturing group. 此模式比對零或一次。Match this pattern either zero or one time.| |`(?\w)`|比對單字字元。Match a single word character. 命名此`letter`擷取群組。Name this the `letter` capturing group.| |`\k`|比對所擷取的字串`letter`擷取群組。Match the string captured by the `letter` capturing group.| [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/cs/item2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/vb/item2.vb#1)]
